translations: 权利，特权；君权，王室特权；特质，特性

sentences.sentence: In many countries education is still the prerogative of the rich.
sentences.translation: 在许多国家接受教育仍然是富人的特权。

sentences.sentence: It is your prerogative to stop seeing that particular therapist and find another one.
sentences.translation: 不再去见那位疗法师而去找另一位是你的特权。

sentences.sentence: King Abdullah, unlike Mr Mubarak, has twice exercised his prerogative to dissolve parliament.
sentences.translation: 和穆巴拉克不同，阿卜杜拉国王已经两次行使了他解散议会的权力。
